alert.note: Alert for Harrison; Marion (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 24 at 11:06PM CDT until September 24 at 11:45PM CDT by NWS Shreveport
info.description: The National Weather Service in Shreveport has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Eastern Marion County in northeastern Texas... Northeastern Harrison County in northeastern Texas... * Until 1145 PM CDT. * At 1106 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Lodi, or 19 miles north of Marshall, moving southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Jefferson, Smithland, Lodi, Karnack, Gray, and Uncertain. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Large hail, damaging wind, and continuous cloud to ground lightning are occurring with this storm. Move indoors immediately. Lightning is one of nature`s leading killers. Remember, if you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning.
